ServiceEnabled.^description: AWS Payment Cryptography service is not enabled or accessible. This service provides payment processing cryptographic operations in a secure, compliant environment for payment card industry workloads.

KeyState.^description: Payment cryptography key is not in the expected CREATE_COMPLETE state. Keys in other states may not be available for cryptographic operations.

KeyUsage.^description: Payment cryptography key does not have properly defined usage restrictions. Key usage should be clearly defined to ensure keys are only used for their intended cryptographic operations.

KeyAlias.^description: Payment cryptography key does not have an alias. Aliases make it easier to manage and reference keys in applications and provide better operational visibility.
